item.armament.supernova_sword.desc1: §d§oForged with the heart of a dying star, this sword hums with celestial energy. Within its hilt lay pure cosmic power, ready wreck destruction at any moment.
item.armament.zeus_thunderbolt.desc1: §e§o",Crafted by the hand of the mighty god §lZeus§r§e§o, this thunderous weapon channels the fury of the heavens. Its crackling energy strikes with the force of a storm, bringing divine retribution upon all who stand before it."
§2§o"In the relentless pursuit of knowledge, its blade carves through the veil of ignorance, severing falsehoods and casting light into the darkest corners of understanding. Each swing carries the weight of unspoken truths, leaving a path of shattered illusions and unyielding clarity in its wake."
item.armament.terraton_hammer.desc1: §2§o"Forged from the unyielding core of an ancient golem, this colossal hammer carries the weight of forgotten eons. Each strike echoes with the power of the earth, capable of shattering stone and bone alike. Wield it wisely, for its strength demands a heavy toll."
item.armament.terraton_hammer.desc4: §2Deal massive damage at the cost of movement and attack speed
item.armament.divine_rhitta_axe.desc1: §6§o"A colossal battle axe imbued with the boundless power of the sun. Originally wielded by Lion Sin Escanor, the One who stands at the pinnacle of all races."
item.armament.divine_rhitta_axe.desc4: §6Right click to summon a miniature sun that ignites all nearby mobs
